author: Omkar Godbole
title: Ether More Favored by Traders as Volatility Against Bitcoin Hits Highest Since FTX Crash
description: ETH call options are trading at a higher premium on Deribit, making it more favorable to traders.
content:
Ethereum's ether 
 token, which has been in the shadows of bitcoin for a long time, is now becoming the new favorite. Data from TradingView shows that the spread between Volmex's annualized 30-day e… [+2289 chars]
